title: Bloomberg Markets: Silver Oak's Weiss on Tech in Wine Business
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Silver Oak's Weiss on Tech in Wine Business
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Nate Weiss Director of Winemaking Silver Oak Cellars Discussing how real data, among other technology, is revolutionizing the wine industry.
